Stata-MCP Configuration Manager

Version 1.6.0 - Configuration Management Interface

Welcome to Stata-MCP

This web interface allows you to configure your Stata-MCP integration settings. You can set up your Stata installation path and specify where output files should be stored.

What you can do here:

  • Configure Stata executable path
  • Set output directory for Stata results
  • Choose between Ollama (local) or OpenAI (cloud) LLM
  • Configure Ollama model settings
  • Set up OpenAI API configuration
  • Validate all configuration settings
  • Import/export configurations
  • Create configuration backups
